231521.「命の声に 満ちているの。\n それに 光も……。:
It's filled with the voice of life. And the
light...

231523.「闇の中で あなたは 私を照らしだした。: In the darkness, you illuminated me.

231531.「……この者は いまだ\n 自分の名前以外 思いだせぬようだ。:
This one still can't seem to remember anything
but his own name.

231533.「この地で しばし 保護していたが\n 依然 その正体は わからぬまま。:
We have been protecting it here for some time,
but its true identity remains unknown.

231535.「だが……\n ひとつだけ わかっていることがある。: But I do know one thing.

231537.「イルーシャが 結晶より現れた時……\n そなたの体内の 魔瘴を 取り除いたであ:
When Irusha emerged from Crystevil she would have removed the demon miasma from your body. This one has the power to control demon
miasma.

231539.「……魔瘴を止める方法とは そのことだ。\n そなたには イルーシャと共に 魔界:
That's how to stop demon miasma. I want you to
travel around Demon World with Irusha and
contain the miasmounds.

231541.「……イルーシャは そなたと 一緒ならば\n 引き受けると言うのでな。なぜか こ:
Irusha said she would accept the job if she
was with you. For some reason, this girl seems
to be attached to you.

231543.「魔瘴塚がある地は…… ジャリムバハ砂漠\n ゲルヘナ幻野 ベルヴァインの森の３:
There are three places where miasmounds are located... Jyarimbaha Desert, Gerhena Field, and Belvain Forest. It doesn't matter which
one you start from.

231545.「３つの魔瘴塚の封印に 成功したら\n ふたたび 我のもとに来るがよい。頼んだぞ:
When you succeed in sealing the three
miasmounds, come back to see me. I'm
counting on you.

231547.「ぼくは こちらで 待っております！\n イルーシャさん いってらっしゃいませ！:
I'll be waiting right here! Have a nice trip,
Ms. Irusha!

231555.「…………見えたのね？: You... you saw it, didn't you?

231559.「……さあ 次の場所に 行きましょう。: ...Now let's go to the next place.

231561.「……さあ ３つ 終わったから\n 魔仙卿のところに 戻りましょう。:
Now that the three are done, let's go back to
Oracle.

231563.「……日に日に 魔瘴が活性化してるようです。\n いよいよ 大魔瘴期も近いってこ:
...It seems that demon miasma is becoming more
active day by day. I wonder if this means that
the Age of Miasma is finally near.

231565.「そんで 亡国ゴーラの近くに位置する\n 我ら バルディスタが\n いちばん 危:
And we, Valdista, located near the exile in
Gora, are in the greatest danger.

231567.「……いまいましい。\n 大魔王選定の儀などという くだらぬ茶番で\n 無駄な時:
...Damn. I wasted my time on such a silly
farce as the Great Demon King Selection
Ceremony.

231571.「……やめろ。\n かまっている時間も 惜しい。: Stop it. I don't have time for this.

231573.「見かけないカオがあるな。: There's a face you don't see.

231577.「さあ 国に帰り\n アストルティアへの侵攻準備を 再開するぞ。\n 我らには:
Now we must return to our country and resume
preparations for the invasion of Astoltia. We
no longer have a moment to lose.

231583.「……さあ 次の場所に 行きましょう。: ...Now let's go to the next place.

231585.「……さあ ３つ 終わったから\n 魔仙卿のところに 戻りましょう。:
Now that the three are done, let's go back to
Oracle.

231587.「なんだ 貴様らは！ なぜ ここにいる！\n さっさと 立ち去らないと 痛い目を:
What the hell are you doing? Why are you here?
Get the hell out of here or I'll hurt you!

231589.「……これこれ そう居丈高に 言うでない。\n 旅の方が おどろかれているであろ:
Do not speak so boldly. The traveler must be
surprised.

231591.「ここは 魔瘴が噴きだす 魔瘴塚です。\n 近づいたら 危ない。\n はやく 離:
This is a miasmound where demon miasma spews
out. It's dangerous to approach. You'd better
get away from it quickly.

231593.「……私なら 大丈夫。\n それを 止めにきたの。: I'll be fine. That's what I'm here to stop.

231599.「いやぁーっ！ すごいすごいっ！\n これは おどろきましたな！: Oh no! Wow, wow, wow! I'm surprised at this!

231601.「……おっと！ 申し遅れましたな。\n ゼクレス魔導国の オジャロスという者です:
Oops! I'm sorry I'm late. I am Ojalos of
Zechres. I hope to make your acquaintance.

231603.「このお方は エルガドーラ王太后様の弟君……\n オジャロス大公で あらせられる:
This is the Grand Duke of Ojalos, brother of
the Dowager Empress Elgadora! You lowly demon,
will you not bow down!

231605.「領地内の魔瘴塚が 活性化しはじめたと聞いて\n 様子を 見にきていたのですが…:
I had heard that the miasmound in the area had begun to activate, so I had come to check on it... but now, thanks to you, I
feel safer already!

231607.「それにしても…… 魔瘴をあやつるなんて\n すばらしいチカラですな！\n あの:
But still... it's amazing how you can control
demon miasma! I've never seen such a miracle
before!

231609.「大いなる闇の根源から 生まれし魔瘴と\n 近しい存在……あなたこそ まさに\n:
Born from the root of the great darkness, and
close to the miasma... you truly deserve to be
called the maiden of miasma!

231613.「おそれながら オジャロス様！\n そろそろ エルガドーラ様との\n 約束のお時:
With all due respect, Master Ojalos! I have an
appointment with Master Elgadora...

231615.「おお そうであった。\n 姉上は 時間に厳しいからのう……。:
Oh, that's right. Your sister is very strict
about time...

231617.「キミたち 魔瘴塚を止めてくれて 助かった！\n ゼクレス魔導国を代表して 礼を:
Thank you for stopping the miasmound! On
behalf of Zechres, let me thank you. Now, if
you'll excuse me.

231619.「……さあ 次の場所に 行きましょう。: ...Now let's go to the next place.

231621.「……さあ ３つ 終わったから\n 魔仙卿のところに 戻りましょう。:
Now that the three are done, let's go back to
Oracle.

231625.「ほう……。\n 見慣れぬ客が 来たな。: Well... an unfamiliar guest has arrived.

231629.「お初に お目にかかります。\n 私は ゴーラの国の長老 ヌブロと申します。:
It is a pleasure to make your acquaintance. My
name is Elder Nubro from the land of Gora.

231631.「直接 そちらに お伺いできなかったゆえ……\n こうして お話しさせていただく:
Since I was not able to visit you in person,
please forgive me for speaking to you in this
way.

231635.「……魔幻都市ゴーラ。\n 先代大魔王 マデサゴーラの本拠であった地だ。:
...the magical phantom city of Gora. It was
the home of the previous Great Demon King
Madesagora.

231637.「だが……もとより 魔瘴の深き地だったゴーラは\n ある時 その大噴出によって:
But...Gora, which had always been deep in
demon miasma, was one day destroyed by its
great demon miasma outpouring.

231641.「ホッホッホッ おっしゃる通りです。\n ですが……少数の民は 難を逃れ\n 今:
Hohohoho, you are right. But there are a few
who have escaped and still live in the land of
Gora.

231643.「……なんとも しぶといものだな。\n そのゴーラの長老の 用向きとなれば……？:
...you're a patient one, aren't you? And if
it's for this Elder of Gora...?

231645.「かろうじて 生きのびた我々ですが……\n さらなる魔瘴の増加に 苦しんでおりま:
We barely survived... but we are suffering
from more demon miasma.

231647.「このままでは 遠からず\n ゴーラは 完全に 死の大地となり果てます。:
At this rate, in the not-too-distant future,
Gora will be completely transformed into a
land of death.

231649.「そこで……\n そちらに いらっしゃる 魔瘴の巫女様。\n あなた様を ゴーラ:
So...my dear demon maiden of miasma, you are
over there. I would like to invite you to
Gora!

231651.「……魔瘴の巫女とな？\n それは…… イルーシャのことか？: ...a maiden of miasma? You mean... Irusha?

231653.「あなた様のおチカラは 邪眼樹を通して\n 拝見させていただきました……。:
I have seen your power through the Evil Eye
Tree...

231655.「イルーシャ様であれば……\n ゴーラの深き魔瘴をも 鎮められましょう。\n ど:
If it is you, Irusha, you will be able to
subdue the deep demon miasma of Gora. Can I
please ask for your help?

231657.「しかし……かの地は 危険に過ぎる。\n イルーシャが行くには あまりにも……:
But it is too dangerous there. It's too
dangerous for Irusha to go there.

231661.「私のチカラが 役に立つのなら。\n それに……何か 思いだせるかもしれない。:
If my power can help. Besides... maybe I can
remember something.

231663.「<pc>と 一緒なら\n どんな危険な場所でも 平気よ。:
With <pc>, I can go anywhere
dangerous.

231665.「……ホッホッホッ。\n なんと ありがたき お言葉。:
I'm so glad to hear that. Thank you very much
for your kind words.

231667.「私どもは ゴーラにて お待ちしております。\n 道中は 魔瘴が深くなっておりま:
We will be waiting for you in Gora. Please be
careful on the way, as the demon miasma is
getting deeper and deeper...

231675.「……この先は 魔瘴が深いようだけれど\n 私が魔瘴を払うから 大丈夫よ。\n:
...There seems to be a deep demon miasma
ahead, but I'll get rid of it, so you'll be
fine. Let's go see the Elder of Gora.

231677.「お待ちしておりました！\n 魔瘴の巫女様……そして 護衛のお方！\n どうか:
We've been expecting you! My dear maiden of
miasma... and your escort! Please help us!

231679.「巫女様が持つ ふしぎなおチカラで 我らを\n 魔瘴から 守ってくださると お聞:
I've heard that the wondrous power of the
priestess protects us from demon miasma!

231681.「おお……巫女様は\n なんと 慈悲深いのでしょう！\n ゴーラの民を お救いく:
Oh... how merciful the priestess is! Save the
people of Gora!

231685.「これこれ。巫女様を こまらせるでない。:
This, this. Don't make the priestesses
impatient.

231687.「改めまして…… ようこそ ゴーラへ。\n はるばる ご足労いただき 感謝します:
Once again, welcome to Gora. Thank you for
making the long trip.

231689.「ここは 大魔王マデサゴーラ様の城だった場所。\n 外は 魔瘴に満ちていたでしょ:
This is the former castle of Great Demon King
Madesagora. The outside was filled with demon
miasma, wasn't it? We live here as a refuge.

231691.「……民が 興奮したようで すみませぬな。\n 長き間 魔瘴に苦しめられてきた\:
I'm sorry that the people have become so excited. We have been tormented by demon miasma for a long time, and the maiden of
miasma is our savior.

231693.「さて……本日は もう お疲れでしょう。\n おふたりのために 部屋を ご用意し:
Well... you must be tired today. We've
prepared a room for the two of you. Please,
this way...

231697.「オレ様の芸術で 歓迎してやろう！: Let's welcome them with my art!

231699.「……フン キマったな。\n オレ様の芸術に 目を奪われて\n 言葉も 出ないと:
Well done. I see you're speechless at the
sight of my art.

231701.「これ！ 巫女様の前で なんと 無礼な！: This! How rude in front of a priestess!

231703.「こら！ マデサゴーラ様が遺された 城の壁に\n ラクガキするなと 何度言えば:
Hey! How many times have I told you not to
make postcards on the walls of the castle that
Madesagora left to you!

231705.「ラクガキではない！ 芸術だ！: It's not a rakugo! It's art!

231707.「それに…… 貴様らのほうこそ 無礼者だろう！\n いったい オレ様を 誰だと思:
And... you are the ones who are rude! Who the
hell do you think you are?

231709.「オレ様は 魔界の芸術に革命を起こす\n 不世出の芸術家…… ペペロゴーラ様だぞ:
I am Peperogora, the unparalleled artist who
will revolutionize the art of the Demon World!

231713.「……うわー 離せっ！ 無礼者！\n オレ様の 芸術的な髪型が乱れる！:
Get off me! Rude! You're messing with my
artistic hair!

231715.「くそっ…… わからず屋の 愚民どもめっ！\n 今に オレ様の芸術が いかに\n:
Damn you... you ignorant, stupid people! Now
I'm going to show you how great my art is!

231717.「……お見苦しいところを お見せしましたな。\n あのペペロゴーラは マデサゴー:
I'm sorry to have to do this to you. That
Peperogora is the grandson of Madesagora, the
only blood relation I have...

231719.「これが 手のつけられない 問題児でして……\n 我らも皆 手を焼いておるのです:
He is an unruly problem child that we are all
having a hard time dealing with.

231721.「あの……私たちは 探しものがあって\n ここまで 来ました。:
Um... we came all this way because we were
looking for something.

231723.「……大魔王の覇印というものです。: ...It is called the Great Demon King Mark.

231725.「ふむ……？ 大魔王の覇印とな……。: Hmm...? It's the Demon King Mark...

231727.「確かに マデサゴーラ様が そのようなものを\n 持っていたと 記憶しております:
I do recall that Madesagora had something like
that, but I honestly don't know where it is.

231729.「大魔王の覇印については 情報を集めさせます。\n 今日は もう 休まれてはいか:
I will have him gather information on the Great Demon King Mark. Why don't you take the rest of the day off? We will let you know if
we learn anything.

231731.「お部屋は あちらの大階段を のぼって\n 右手に 進んだところに ございます。:
The rooms are just over there, up the main
stairs Going Up on your right. Come,
priestess. This way, please...

231733.「……先に 部屋に行ってるわね。: I think he's going to his room first.

231735.「ちょ～っと 待ったぁぁぁ！！: Wait a minute! Wait a minute!

231737.「……マデサゴーラじじいの\n アトリエに行くと 言ったな！:
...you said you were going to Madesagora's old
man's studio!

231739.「ならば その案内役……このペペロゴーラ様が\n 引き受けようではないか！:
Then let us take on the role of guide... this
Peperogora!

231741.「……何を バカなことを！\n お前などが 行っても\n 巫女様の 足手まといに:
What nonsense! You'll only slow down the
priestess!

231743.「なぜだ！？ じじいのことなら\n オレ様が ゴーラの誰よりも 知っているぞ！:
Why? I know the old man better than anyone in
Gola!

231745.「いいや ならん！\n おふたりは 遊びにいくわけではないのだ。:
No, no, no! The two of you are not going out
to play.

231747.「だいたい お前にできることと言えば\n お絵かき程度のものではないか。\n そ:
What you can do is nothing more than drawing.
What good are you to me!

231749.「なんだと！ お絵かきではない！\n オレ様は…… 芸術を……っ！:
What the hell! I'm not drawing! I am...
art...!

231751.「……クソッ 石アタマめ！\n どいつも こいつも……わからず屋だッ！:
Damn stone head! Every time I look at him...
he's a fucking clueless bastard!

231755.「ふう…… またも お見苦しいところを……。:
Phew... again, I'm sorry for the
inconvenience...

231757.「ペペロは…… 幼き頃に 両親を失いまして。\n マデサゴーラ様に代わって\n:
Pepero lost his parents when he was very
young. I took care of him on behalf of
Madesagora.

231759.「偉大な芸術家である 祖父の影響か\n 芸術を志すようになったのですが\n その:
I was inspired to pursue art by my
grandfather, a great artist, who passed
away...

231761.「あれも かわいそうな子なのです。\n それで きかん坊になっておるんですな。:
Poor little thing. That's why he's a little
boy.

231763.「おっと 話の途中でしたな。: Oops, you were in the middle of speaking.

231765.「……近年 魔瘴が増えていると 話しましたな。\n その魔瘴が 発生していると思:
I told you that demon miasma has been increasing in recent years. We believe that demon miasma is occurring in the Lower part of
Gora, where the Phantom Garden is located.

231767.「魔幻園で 大魔王の覇印を 探されるのであれば\n そのついでで かまいませんの:
If you are going to search for the Great Demon King Mark in the Magic Garden, would you mind investigating the cause of the outpouring of
miasma as well?

231769.「魔幻園は 今は 魔瘴に沈んでおり\n もともとあった道も 地形が変わってしまっ:
The original path has been changed and cannot
be used because of the demon miasma.

231771.「現在 魔幻園へ行く手段は ただひとつ……\n マデサゴーラ様が 遺された 不思:
Currently, the only way to get to the Garden of Illusions is by the mysterious "Coffin to the Abyss," a vehicle left behind by
Madesagora.

231773.「奈落へいざなう棺桶の 乗り場でしたら\n この宮殿を出て 十字路を 西に進んで:
If you are looking for the Coffin to the
Abyss, you can find it by leaving this palace
and going west on the crossroads.

231775.「おふたりとも……くれぐれも お気をつけて。\n よろしく 頼みましたぞ。:
Take care of yourselves, both of you. I'll be
counting on you.

231777.「フハハハハッ！\n 待っていたぞ 魔瘴の巫女！:
Hahahahaha! I've been waiting for you, maiden
of miasma!

231779.「あなたは…… ペペロゴーラくん？\n どうして ここに……: Are you... Peperogora? How did you get here?

231781.「フン！ 決まっているだろう。\n オレ様も 魔幻園に行きたいからだ！:
Hmph! It's obvious, isn't it? Because I want
to go to the Magic Garden too!

231783.「いいか？ ゴーラが壊滅する前に\n マデサゴーラのじじいが アトリエにこもって:
Okay? You've probably heard that Madesagora's old man was holed up in his Studio Front working on something big before Gora was
destroyed.

231785.「その作品は…… マデサゴーラ芸術を愛する\n 好事家たちの間で 幻の大作と呼ば:
The work is called the "Great Work of Art" by
lovers of Madesagora's art. I must see it!

231787.「……というわけだ！\n オレ様を じじいのアトリエに連れていけ！<yesno>:
I'll take you to the old man's studio. Take me
to the bastard's studio! <yesno><close>

231789.「なんだか 放っておけないわ。\n 連れていってあげましょう？<yesno><c:
I don't know, I can't leave him alone. Shall I
take you with me? <yesno><close>

231793.「フハハハ！ さすがは 巫女と その護衛だ！\n じつに ものわかりがいいな！\:
Hahahaha! A priestess and her guards, indeed!
You really know your stuff! You can be my
henchman!

231795.「そうと決まれば さっそく\n 魔幻園マデッサンスに 出発だ！:
Well, we'll be off to the Demon Park
Madessaince as soon as we decide!

231797.「フン……これが じじいが作った\n 奈落へいざなう棺桶か。魔幻園には\n 別の:
This is the coffin to the Abyss that the son of a bitch has made. I've never been to the park before, because I went there by
a different route.

231799.「……おい 巫女と その護衛。\n 何をしている！ はやく 乗れ！:
Hey, the priestess and her guards. What are
you doing? Quick, get in!

231801.「……ペペロゴーラくん。巫女と 護衛じゃなくて\n ちゃんと 名前で呼んでね。\:
Peperogora. You should call me by my name, not
"priestess" and "escort". I am Irusha. And I'm
<pc>.

231803.「それに 巫女かどうかも わからないの。\n ……記憶がなくて おぼえていないか:
And I don't know if I'm a priestess or not. I
don't remember.

231805.「フン…… 記憶がないクセに\n 巫女呼ばわりされるがままに なっているとは\n:
How dare you be so independent that you have
no memory and yet you are still being called a
priestess!

231807.「そんな生き方は 芸術性に欠けるぞ。\n もっと 自分というものを 表現すべきだ:
That kind of life lacks artistry. You should
express yourself more. Like this Peperogora!

231811.「……なんだ？ 何が おかしい？\n オレ様を バカにしているなら……:
What's... what's going on? What's so funny? If
you think I'm stupid...

231815.「な…なんだ……この妙な乗り物は……。: What... what... is this strange vehicle...

231821.「はァはァ…… おそろしい乗り物だった。\n まったく じじいも 趣味が悪い。:
It was a horrible ride. The old man has bad
taste, too.

231823.「そうかしら？\n 私 もう一度 乗ってみたい……。:
I don't know if that's true. I'd like to ride
it again.

231825.「……魔瘴が深いわ。\n ふたりとも……私から 離れないで。\n 気をつけて 進:
...demon miasma runs deep. Both of you... stay
close to me. Let's proceed with care.

231827.「よしッ！ ここに\n じじいが描いた 幻の大作があるはず……。:
Yes! I'm sure there's a great work of art here
that my old man painted...

231829.「アトリエが…… な なんてことだ。\n 魔物のしわざなのか？\n 天井が 壊れ:
The studio... Oh, my God. Is it a wrinkle of a
monster? The ceiling's broken!

231833.「幻の大作が…… 見当たらないだとッ！？: The great work of art... is missing?

231839.「おお すごいぞ！\n これは 幻の大作のデッサンだ！: Oh, my God! This is a great, phantom sketch!

231841.「……なるほど。魔法のカンバスの中に\n 生きた魔物たちを封じ込め それを絵とし:
I see. So you were trying to contain living
monsters in a magical canvas and make a
painting out of it!

231843.「『ほとばしる命の狂宴』というのが\n 作品のタイトルか。ふむふむ……:
The title of the work is "The Mad Banquet of
Life"? Hmmm...

231845.「この絵の 制作ノートみたい。\n ……制作の過程が 書かれているわ。:
It's like a production notebook for this
painting. It describes the process of
creation.

231847.「……数百匹の魔物どもを 捕らえることにも\n 苦労したが…… 魔瘴竜の封印には:
We had a hard time capturing the hundreds of
monsters, but we had a lot of trouble sealing
the Jaomanda.

231849.「魔瘴竜を 絵の中に 封じ込めるには\n 余が創った 特殊な顔料を使って\n 目:
To contain the Jaomanda in the painting, I had
to weaken it by painting sigils on its eyes
using a special pigment I created...

231851.「……顔料？ それは じじいから拝借して\n オレ様が 使っている 顔料のことか:
Pigment? You mean the pigment I borrowed from
my grandfather and use?

231853.「この顔料に そんなチカラがあったとはな。: I didn't know this pigment had such power.

231855.「……そうして 絵の中に 竜を引きずり込み\n 特製のカンバスに 大魔王の覇印を:
...and then drag the dragon into the painting and stamp the Great Demon King Mark's seal on the special canvas to finally seal the
Jaomanda King Mark. ...

231857.「……果たして\n 『ほとばしる命の狂宴』は完成した。:
The "Spurting Life Madness Banquet" was
completed.

231859.「だが……できあがった『狂宴』には\n 何かが 欠けている。\n 余が望んだもの:
But... something is missing from the resulting
"mad party. Is this what I wanted?

231861.「余は……生命のあがきを！ 苦悩を！ 葛藤を！\n 描きたかったのではないのか！:
I will... struggle for life! The anguish! The
struggle! Isn't that what you wanted to
depict!

231863.「……この絵は 失敗作だ。すててしまおう。:
...This picture is a failure. Let's throw it
away.

231865.「……だが 費やした時間は 無駄ではなかった。\n 本当に 生きた作品を 創る方:
But the time spent was not in vain. I think I
have found the answer to the question of how
to create a truly living work of art.

231867.「……幻の大作を作るのに\n 大魔王の覇印が 使われていたみたい。\n 手がかり:
It seems that the Great Demon King Mark was
used to create the fantastic masterpiece. I
think I found a clue.

231869.「幻の大作を……\n す…す……: The great work of a visionary... so...

231871.「お…終わった……。\n オレ様の 芸術的人生は おしまいだ……。: I'm done... my artistic life is over...

231875.「オレ様は…… ここのところ スランプでな。\n いくら 絵を描いても 描いても:
I've been in a slump for a while now. No
matter how many paintings I do, something
always seems to be missing.

231877.「だから じじいが没頭して 制作したという\n 幻の大作を見れば…… きっと オ:
So when I saw the old Multifists' work, the
one that he was so devoted to, I knew it would
ignite the artist in me. I knew it!

231879.「そうすれば……\n ゴーラの愚民どもを 見返せるような\n 世紀の傑作が 創れ:
I felt that if I did that I could create the
masterpiece of the century that would make all
the fools in Gora look back!

231881.「オレ様は…… じじいみたいな\n すごい芸術家に なりたかった……。\n それ:
I wanted to be a great artist like my
grandfather, so I painted a lot and worked
hard.

231883.「だが どれだけ 描いても……\n 誰にも 認めてもらえぬ。\n ただ ラクガキ:
But no matter how many times I paint... no one
will recognize me. They will just make fun of
me for being a lazy kid.

231885.「じじいと違って オレ様には\n 才能が ないのだ……。: Unlike my grandfather, I have no talent...

231889.「すてられた 幻の大作だって\n 見つかるかもしれないわ。\n あきらめないで:
You might even find a discarded masterpiece.
Don't give up, let's look for it.

231891.「ぺ……ペペロくんだとぉ！？ \n そんなふうに 気安く 呼ぶとは\n いったい:
Pe-pe-pero-kun? Who do you think you are to
call me that?

231893.「……ああッ そうだッ！\n 思いだした！ この近くの谷に じじいが\n よく失:
Oh, yes! I remember now! In the valley near
here, the old man used to throw away his
garbage.

231895.「フハハハハ！ オレ様としたことが\n みっともないところを 見せたな！:
Ha-ha-ha-ha! I've shown you how pathetic I can
be!

231897.「じじいが 失敗作を すてていた谷……\n 芸術の墓場は このアトリエの地下にお:
The valley where the old man used to discard
his failures, the graveyard of Art, is just
beyond the basement of this Cemetery of Art!

231903.「大魔王の覇印は 見当たらないようだけど……\n 今は 絵を探しに 芸術の墓場に:
I can't seem to find the Great Demon King Mark
but for now let's go to the Cemetery of Art to
look for the painting.

231905.「……おおッ！ あれこそは\n じじいの 幻の大作ではないか？:
Oh! Isn't that the old man's greatest work of
art?

231907.「しかし 何も 描かれていないな。\n では 違うのか……。: But there's nothing on it. Then it's not...

231913.「ひ…ひええっ！\n 絵から…… 竜が飛びだしてきた……！:
Hee... hee! A dragon jumped out of the
painting...!

231915.「マデサゴーラさんが\n 絵画に封じ込めたという魔瘴竜……。\n 魔瘴が増えてい:
The demon miasma dragon that Mr. Madesagora
said he sealed in the painting... it was the
cause of the increase in demon miasma.

231919.「よくも……我を 封印しおったなァァァ！: How dare you... seal me up!

231921.「……目に 封印の紋章が入ってる。\n でも 片目だけだわ。:
...a seal crest in his eye. But it's only in
one eye.

231923.「もしかしたら もう片方にも 紋章を入れれば\n 魔瘴竜を 退治できるんじゃない:
Maybe if we put a sigil in the other one, we
can kill the Jaomanda?

231925.「……オッ オレ様がやるのか！？: Oh, I'm going to do it?

231927.「ムッ…ムリだ！ このオレ様に じじいと\n 同じことが できるはずがないだろう:
I can't do it! There is no way I can do what
the son of a bitch is doing!

231933.「それは……大魔王の覇印？\n この魔物が 飲み込んでいたのね。:
Is that... the Great Demon King Mark? This
monster must have swallowed it.

231935.「我を 封印した\n いまいましき 覇印がァ……。: The mighty seal that has sealed me...

231939.「ぬ…ぬわッ！ こ…こっちに 来るなァ！: No... no! Get away from me!

231941.「オレ様の 芸術的な髪型が……: I've got my own artistic hair style...

231943.「……乱れるだろうがッ！！: You'll get it all mixed up!

231953.「オレ様の才能をもってすれば\n これしき たやすいわ！ フハハハ……:
With my talent, this should be a piece of
cake! Hahahaha...

231959.「これは……オレ様が 完成させた絵だ……！\n 絶対に はなさな……:
This is the picture I completed. Don't ever
let go...

231965.「今よ！ 絵画に 大魔王の覇印を！: Now! Put the Demon King Mark on the painting!

231967.「イルーシャ 貴様……すごいな！\n あんなにあった魔瘴が なくなってしまったぞ:
Irusha, you're amazing! All that demon miasma
is gone!

231969.「やけに 痛々しいが……大丈夫なのかッ？:
It looks very painful, but... are you all
right?

231971.「私は 平気……すぐに治るわ。それよりも……: I'm fine... it'll pass. It's more like...

231979.「フ……フハハハハ！ オレ様の\n みなぎる芸術的才能が 炸裂したのだから\n:
H...hahahahahaha! I'm bursting with artistic
talent, so it's only natural that I should do
this!

231981.「……よし！ さっそく この絵を持って帰り\n ゴーラの愚民どもに 見せてくれよ:
...Okay! Now take this painting home and show
it to the fools of Gora! I'm sure they will be
moved to tears!

231983.「オレ様は 先に 城へ戻っている！\n 貴様らも さっさと 来るがよいぞ！:
I'm going back to the castle! You better get
your asses back here!

231985.「ペペロくん……元気が出たみたいね。\n よかったわ。:
Mr. Pepero...you seem to be feeling better.
I'm glad.

231987.「さあ 私たちも 魔幻宮殿に帰りましょう。: Come on, let us go back to the Demon Palace.

231989.<cs_pchero>は\n大魔王の覇印（だいじなもの）を 手に入れた！<me:
<cs_pchero> received
the Great Demon King Mark (Key Item)!<me 60>

231991.「これが マデサゴーラ様の 幻の大作……\n 『ほとばしる命の狂宴』を\n ペペ:
This is the picture of Madesagora's great work
of art, "The Frenzied Banquet of Spurting
Life," which was completed by Pepero...

231993.「……ふーむ。\n いまいち ピンと来んなァ。: Hmmm... I can't quite figure it out.

231995.「やはり マデサゴーラ様の芸術にあるような\n 深淵なる美が この絵には 足りな:
I still feel that this painting lacks the
profound beauty of Madesagora's art.

231997.「そうかしら？\n 私は…… 希望が感じられて 好きよ。:
I don't know. I like it because it gives me
hope.

231999.「フハハハ！ 貴様らには まだ\n オレ様の芸術を理解できる 審美眼がないのだ！:
Hahahaha! You still don't have the aesthetic
sense to appreciate my art! But... you will
learn!

232001.「むう…… 巫女様が そうおっしゃるのなら\n 何も 言いませぬ……。:
Well... if the priestess says so, I have
nothing to say...

232003.「……この絵は もとは じじいの作品だ。\n だから これは 通過点にすぎぬ。\:
This picture is the son's work. This is just a
passing point. Next time, I will create
something more my style!

232005.「そして……いつかは じじいを超える\n 魔界最高の 芸術家になってやる！\n:
And one day I will surpass the son of a bitch
and become the greatest artist in Demon World!
Hahahahahaha!

232007.「あッ そういえば…… 貴様らは\n ここへ 大魔王の覇印を取りにきたのだったな:
Ah, come to think of it... you guys came here
to get the Demon King Mark, didn't you?

232009.「どうやら 手元にあるようだが\n 持って帰って かまわんぞ。\n じじいに代わ:
It looks like you have it on hand, but you're
welcome to take it home with you. I'll allow
it on behalf of the old man!

232011.「……ペペロから あらましは 聞きました。\n おふたりのご活躍で ゴーラを覆っ:
I heard the whole story from Pepero. He told
me that the two of you were able to quell the
deep demon miasma that had covered Gora.

232013.「ひとまず ゴーラは 救われました。\n おふたりのご助力 まことに 感謝いたし:
For the time being, Gora has been saved. Thank
you both very much for your help. Please
accept our gratitude.

232015.「それは さておき……<pc>！\n 世話になったな。何か あったら いつでも\:
That aside...! Thanks for taking care of me. If you need anything at all, just let me know! I'm here to help you with your
artistic endeavors!

232017.「未来の偉大なる芸術家……ペペロゴーラ様がな！\n フハハハハハ！:
The great artist of the future... the great
Peperogora! Hahahahahaha!

232019.「結局 私の記憶は 戻らなかった。\n 自分が 何者なのか わからないまま……。:
In the end, my memory did not return. I didn't
know who I was.

232021.「けれど ペペロくんを見ていて\n そんなことは 重要じゃないって 気づいたの。:
But looking at Mr. Pepero, I realized that
such things are not important.

232023.「……大事なのは 私が 何をしたいか。\n 今は 私がしたいと思ったことを\n:
The important thing is what I want to do. Now
I've decided to do what I want to do, just as
I want to do it.

232027.「待っていたぞ 魔瘴の巫女。: I was waiting for you, Maiden of Miasma.

232029.「お前に 用がある。\n 私たちと 共に 来てもらおう。:
I have something for you. We need you to come
with us.

232033.「我ら バルディスタは\n 魔瘴増加の危機に 瀕している。\n このままでは ゴ:
Valdista is in danger of experiencing an
increase in demon miasma. If we don't do
something about it, we'll end up like Gora.

232035.「だが……お前のチカラがあれば\n その危機を 取り除くことができる。\n バル:
But... with your help, we can remove the
danger. We can save Valdista from the demon
miasma.

232037.「おとなしく ついてくるなら\n 悪いようにはしない。:
If you follow meekly, I won't do anything bad
to you.

232039.「……これは 交渉ではない。命令だ。: This is not a negotiation. It's an order.

232049.「……よう。\n どいつもこいつも 相変わらずだな。: I see.... They all look the same as ever.

232051.「ユシュカ……いったい 何のつもりだ！？: Yushka...what the hell are you doing!

232053.「<pc>。俺のしもべを やめたら\n 今度は 巫女のしもべに なったというわけ:
. So you stopped being my servant, and now you've become a priestess's servant. You've got the guts of a servant, you
know that?

232055.「ヴァレリア…… お前の軍は\n 毎度 しのびこみやすくて 助かる。\n 相変わ:
Valeria your army is always so easy to sneak
into. As usual, you're not at your feet.

232057.「このようなことをして\n ただで済むとは 思っていないだろうな？:
You don't expect to get away with this for
free, do you?

232059.「おお 怖い怖い。\n すぐに 怒りだすのも 相変わらずか。:
Oh, scary, scary. Is it the same as ever that
you get angry easily?

232061.「……魔瘴の巫女は この俺が もらった。\n 返してほしくば ファラザードの城ま:
The maiden of miasma was given to me. If you
want her back, come to Farazard Castle.

232067.「バルディスタ各地の 部隊を集め\n ファラザードに 進軍するッ！:
I will rally the troops from all over Valdista
and march on Farazard!

232069.「……こりゃあ でけえ戦争になるぜェ。: This is going to be a big war.

244534.「もう 眠ってしまった？\n 起こしてしまったら ごめんなさい。:
Have you fallen asleep already? I'm sorry if I
woke you.

244535.「私……闇の中のことは 覚えていないけれど\n きっと 怖い思いをしていた。\n:
I... don't remember what I saw in the dark,
but I'm sure I was scared. I really appreciate
you letting me go.

244536.「まだ 何もかもが もやに包まれたまま。\n けれど あなたのそばにいれば\n:
Everything is still shrouded in darkness. But
somehow, I feel like things will go well if I
stay close to you.

244537.「……明日も 早いわ。\n ゴーラの国のみんなのため がんばりましょう。\n お:
...Tomorrow comes early. Let's do our best for
the people of Gora. Good night...

247723.「<pc>と 一緒なら\n どんな危険な場所でも 平気よ。:
With <pc>, I can go anywhere
dangerous.

250985.「……そうだ イルーシャ。\n じつは 貴様に 渡したいものがあるのだ。\n 後:
Yes, Irusha. I have something for you. Come to
my office later.

251673.<pc>と イルーシャは\n真・魔幻宮殿のロビーに 向かった……。:
<pc> and Irusha headed for the lobby
of the True Demon Palace...

253531.……魔仙卿から <pc>に話があるようだ。\n魔仙卿に 話しかけてみよう。:
...I think Oracle wants to talk to
<pc>. Let's talk to Oracle.
